snippet: Raul Pacheco, 21, and Eric Landron, 23, were arrested last week in the killing of Alphonza Bryant III, whose death the Bloomberg administration singled out in its campaign against gun violence.
lead_paragraph: Raul Pacheco, 21, and Eric Landron, 23, were arrested last week in the killing of Alphonza Bryant III, whose death the Bloomberg administration singled out in its campaign against gun violence.

headline.seo: Two Men Are Charged With Murder in Shooting of Alphonza Bryant
headline.main: Two Men Are Charged With Murder in Shooting of Bronx Teenager
headline.print_headline: Two Men Are Charged With Murder in Shooting of Bronx Teenager
